texts.es: Agripina es socia del Banco Comunal Ccatun Sacha. Tiene 44 años de edad y es madre de 4 hijos. Es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 2 años. Se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado. Se siente orgullosa de sí misma porque aprendió a ahorrar, y cuenta con la amistad de sus compañeras de su Banco Comunal. Nos comenta que las capacitaciones que recibe la ayudaron mucho y ahora sabe cómo administrar de manera adecuada su dinero. Su sueño es terminar con el acabado de su vivienda. Agripina invertirá el préstamo que solicita en la compra de semillas de diferentes vegetales.
texts.en: Agripina is a member of the Banco Comunal Ccatun Sacha [Community Bank Ccatun Sacha]. She is 44 years old and the mother of 4 children. She has been a member of FINCA Perú for 2 years, and works selling vegetables in the market. She feels proud of herself because she has learned to save, and has the friendship of her colleagues from the Banco Comunal [Community Bank]. She says that the training she received there helped her a lot, and now she knows how to manage her money well. Her dream is to finish work on her home. Agripina will use the loan she is asking for to purchase seeds of different vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase seeds of different vegetables.

loans.name: Farhod

texts.en:
Farhod is a man who always finds new ways of income.  He is energetic and handsome.  Farhod likes to be in a competitive business because he is a very successful business man. 

He has been in animal husbandry for more than ten years.  He buys cattle, raises them and sells them to local people. He has many customers, and many of them are butchers. 

Farhod has a lovely wife and three children. Farhod is only breadwinner in the family. His children are in school, and their needs are growing. He is asking a loan to buy young cattle for developing his business. He awaits your help and mercy.

loans.use: To buy young cattle to raise.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de artesanias,la socia vende chompas,mantas,telares y chalinas,la socia tiene una tienda donde atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de artesania.La socia solicita el credito para comprar chompas,telares y mantas al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues to manage her business of selling handcrafted items such as sweaters, blankets, woven articles, and scarves. She has a store that she operates from 8am to 6pm. Through this business, she has been able to help her son move forward. Her dream is to expand and improve her craft business.

The member is requesting a loan in order to buy sweaters, woven articles, and blankets in bulk. She is pleased with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy sweaters, woven articles, and blankets in bulk.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 33 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy dinámica. Está separada del padre de sus tres hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Vive con su anciano padre y sus hijos, donde les brinda educación y una crianza con valores para ser formados como buenas personas en el futuro.

Desde hace 3 años se dedica a la venta de ropa en un puesto ubicado en el mercado de su localidad. Decidió empezar con esta actividad cuando vio que la economía de su hogar siempre pasaba apuros, tuvo la idea, luego se dio valor y fuerza para lograr concretarla. Empezó a vender ropa trayéndola desde la capital, ya que ahí le costaba más barato, vendía poco y sólo entre sus vecinos, con el paso del tiempo pudo tener un pequeño local y ahora vende en mayores cantidades. Está muy contenta, ya que le genera buenas ganancias con lo cual puede aportar en la economía de su hogar. 

Este es su préstamo numero 7 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que le permitirá estar más tranquila y avanzar con sus planes de su negocio. Se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual y sobre todo compenetrarse más con los integrantes de su banco comunal que son muy solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado, 2000 soles, comprará ropa y accesorios de toda variedad, preparándose para la venta en estas fiestas patrias y continuar con su trabajo para seguir ofreciendo novedades a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Carmen is 33 years old.  She is a nice, friendly, dynamic woman who is separated from the father of her three children.  She wants to provide her children with a better quality of life.  Carmen lives with her elderly father and her children.  She provides the children with an education and an upbringing which teaches them values and prepares them as upstanding citizens of the future.

Carmen has been selling clothing from a stall in her town market for three years.  She decided to start this business when she saw that her household was experiencing financial difficulties.  She had the idea and then summoned up the courage and strength to see it through.  She started selling clothing which she bought in the capital city because it was cheaper there.  At first, she only sold a little and only to her neighbors.  Over time, she was able to get hold of small premises and she now sells in larger quantities.  She is very happy because her business makes her good profits which enables her to contribute financially to her household.

This is Carmen's seventh loan from MFP.  She is very happy to know that she will have financial support because it will allow her to calmly make progress with her business plans.  She pledges to make her repayments on time and, above all, to work well with the other members of her community bank who are very supportive people.

Carmen will use the 2,000 soles she has requested to buy all kinds of clothing and accessories so that she can get ready for the Peruvian national holidays and continue in her work, offering new products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy clothing and accessories for the Peruvian national holidays

loans.name: Ikrom

texts.ru:
Икром занимается торговлей кураги и переработкой абрикосового сада с целью дальнейшей реализации. Ему 37 лет. Икром живет с женой. У него трое детей. Торговлей Икром занимается один, но в переработки абрикоса ему помогает жена. В этой области Икром три года. 
Икром просит кредит для приобретения саженцев абрикосовых деревьев. Кроме того он хочет купить один гектар земли рядом с абрикосовым садом.
texts.en: Ikrom is involved in selling dried apricots and processing of an apricot orchard for future sale.  He is 37 years old.  Ikrom lives with his wife, and they have three children.  Ikrom is involved in sales by himself, but his wife helps him with processing the apricots.  He has been in this business for three years.  Ikrom is requesting this loan to purchase apricot tree seedlings.  Besides this, he wants to purchase one hectare of land next to his apricot orchard.

loans.use: to purchase apricot tree seedlings and one hectare of land

loans.name: Mohidakhon

texts.ru: Мохидахон родилась 1989 году в Исфаре. Она трудолюбивая и ответственная женщина. Мохидахон не замужем. Она не имеет детей. Мохидахон занимается сушкой и продажей абрикосов. У нее более 20 плодовых деревьев. Мохидахон уже три года занимается этим видом деятельности. Она берет кредит для приобретения саженцев абрикосовых деревьев с целью расширения своей деятельности.
texts.en: Mohidakhon was born in 1989 in Isfara.  She is a hardworking and responsible woman.  Mohidakhon is not married and has no children.  She is involved in drying and selling apricots.  She has over 20 fruit-producing trees.  Mohidakhon has been in this business for three years.  She is requesting this loan to buy apricot-tree seedlings in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings

loans.name: Emilia

texts.es: Emilia es socia del Banco Comunal Ccatun Sacha. Tiene 47 años de edad y es madre de 3 hijos. Es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 2 años. Es dueña de una bodega que tiene en su propia casa y trabaja en ella con la ayuda de sus hijas en sus tiempos libres, por otra parte se dedica a la venta de truchas al por menor. Se siente feliz de pertenecer a su Banco Comunal porque allí aprendió a ahorrar y conoció amigas con las que intercambia experiencias. Está agradecida con la institución por las facilidades de préstamo que le ofrece. Emilia invertirá el préstamo que solicita en la compra de truchas al por mayor y también en la compra de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar y bebidas.
texts.en: Emilia is a member of the Ccatun Sacha Communal Bank. She is 47 years old and is the mother of 3 children. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for two years. She is the owner of a small store that she has in her own home, and she works there with the help of her children who help her in their spare time. She also sells trout. She feels happy to belong to the communal bank because there she learned to save and also met friends with whom she has exchanged experiences. She is grateful to the institution for the ease with which the loan was offered. Emilia will inves the solicited loan in the purchase of wholesale trout and also purchase goods for her store, such as rice, sugar and drinks.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale trout and groceries such as rice, sugar, and drinks

loans.name: Xenia

texts.es:
Xenia tiene 20 años, es una mujer trabajadora y dinámica, además de amable y jovial. Es soltera y no tiene hijos todavía. Vive en una casa alquilada con sus padres y su hermano, a los quiere mucho.
Su negocio es la venta de comida como tallarines, arroz chaufa, pollo frito y refrescos. Para eso instala una mesa y sillas en el frotis de su vivienda, al medio día, donde brinda almuerzos. Se inició con el apoyo de un capital que le brindó su madre hace tres años, trabajó con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación logrando ganarse una regular clientela a la que ahora atiende regularmente. Le gusta sentirse una mujer productiva, su negocio la distrae y relaja, además con el ingreso económico que le genera puede apoyar a su familia y pagar sus estudios universitarios por las noches. Lo que no le gusta es el calor de la cocina a carbón, pues perjudica la salud, pero eso no la desanima, ya que tiene planes de continuar y ampliar su negocio.

Este es su tercer préstamo con la institución MFP, por tanto espera continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, se siente bien con su banco comunal, pues considera a sus miembros ser personas responsables.
Con el monto solicitado, 1500 nuevos soles, comprará utensilios de cocina como platos, ollas, sartenes; también ingredientes para la preparación de sus comidas.
texts.en:
Xenia is 20 years old.  She is a hard-working, dynamic woman who is friendly and cheerful.  She is single and doesn't have any children yet.  She lives in a rental house together with her parents and brother who she loves very much.

Xenia's business is selling food such as noodles, 'arroz chaufa' (a Peruvian-Asian dish), fried chicken and soft drinks.  She sets up a table and chairs out the front of her house at midday and sells lunches there.  She started out with some capital that her mother gave her three years ago.  She has worked with a lot of effort and commitment and gained a bunch of customers who now visit her regularly.  She enjoys feeling productive.  Her business both entertains and relaxes her.  In addition, she is able to use the income that she makes to support her family and pay for her university studies (she studies at night).  What she does not like is the heat from the coal-burning stove as it is bad for her health.  However, she does not become discouraged and has plans to continue in her business and expand it.

This is Xenia's third loan from MFP and she hopes to continue achieving her aims.  She feels happy to be a member of her community bank as she considers the members to be responsible people.

Xenia will use the 1,500 soles she has requested to buy cooking utensils such as dishes, pans and skillets.  She will also buy ingredients for making food.

loans.use: to buy cooking utensils and ingredients for preparing food

loans.name: Justina

texts.es: Justina es socia del Banco Comunal Ccatun Sacha. Tiene 48 años de edad y es madre de 3 hijos. Es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 3 años. Es dueña de una bodega de abarrotes. Le gusta mucho ser parte de su Banco Comunal ya que en el recibe capacitaciones con las que aprende mucho sobre su negocio y su familia, y también conoció amigas con las que comparte sus experiencias. Está agradecida con la institución por las facilidades de préstamo que le ofrece. Está feliz porque cada día mejora su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Justina invertirá el préstamo que solicita en la compra de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite, bebidas, fideos, harina, etc.
texts.en: Justina is a member of the Banco Comunal Ccatun Sacha [Community Bank Ccatun Sacha]. She is 48 years old and the mother of 3 children. She has been a member of FINCA Perú for 3 years, and is the owner of a small grocery store. She enjoys being a part of the Banco Comunal [Community Bank] very much, because she receives training that teaches her a lot about her business and her family, and also because she has made friends with whom she can share her experiences. She is grateful to the institution for the loan opportunities offered. She is happy because her quality of life, and that of her family, improves every day. Justina will use the loan she is requesting to purchase groceries such as rice, sugar, oil, beverages, noodles, flour, etc.

loans.use: to purchase groceries such as rice, sugar, oil, beverages, noodles, flour, etc.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana tiene 56 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora. Vive en su casa propia junto a su pareja, quien por el momento se encuentra desempleado, uno de sus hijos, su nuera y sus dos nietos. Tuvo en total diez hijos, pero ya son mayores e independientes.

Su trabajo es la venta de plátano. Esta actividad la realiza en el frontis de su vivienda. Ya tiene muchos clientes, porque sus frutas son de muy buena calidad y es una vendedora muy alegre. Le gusta su trabajo porque puede conversar con las personas y bromear entre ellas. Lleva 2 años realizando esta actividad y al principio, cuando se inició, le era muy complicado, ya que tenía que aprender el negocio de cómo conservar el plátano en buen estado, porque en algunas ocasiones se le malogró y perdió su inversión; pero con el tiempo logró aprender y ahora le está yendo mucho mejor. Para el futuro, desea tener un pequeño local donde pueda vender sus plátanos sin temor a que se malogren por lo caluroso de clima de la región.

Este es su crédito número 4 con MFP y está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, pues así se sentirá más segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado, se compromete, una vez más, a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que no desea quedar mal con su grupo, donde todos son muy puntuales.
Con el monto solicitado, 1000 soles, invertirá, en su totalidad, en la compra de plátanos de diversas variedades, ya que últimamente está teniendo mayor demanda y desea ampliar el tipo y la calidad de su producto.
texts.en:
Juana, 56, is a friendly, hard-working woman.  She and her husband--who, for now, is unemployed--live in a house that they own, along with a son, his wife and their two children.  Juana has ten children, all of whom are grown now.

Juana operates a fruit and vegetable sales business in a space that she's set aside at the front of her house.  She has many customers who rely both on the freshness of her products and her cheerful service.  The business suits her because she likes meeting her customers and sharing a laugh with them.  She has operated the business for 2 years and lost money at first because her fruits and vegetables often rotted before she could sell them.  Over time, she learned the business and says that she's doing much better now.  For the future, she would like to open a small shop where she can sell platanos without worrying that they'll rot in the region's hot climate before she can sell them.

This is Juana's fourth MFP loan and she says that she is grateful for your support because it will help her to carry on her business.  She wants the other members of her community bank to view her as a reliable member and she is committed to repaying this loan in the agreed-upon time.  
Juana will use your 1000-soles loan to stock her business with different kinds of platanos because that's the product she sells that is most in demand.  The investment will help her to provide a wider range of merchandise.

loans.use: to stock her fruit and vegetable business.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
Nilda tiene 40 años, es una muy buena mujer y madre de dos hijos: Yemilet de 13 años y, el menor, Frank de 7 años, quienes son su razón de esfuerzo, ya que desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida.  Está casada con Edson, de 47 años, quien es electricista. La casa donde viven le fuera heredada por sus padres.

Ella se dedica a elaborar piñatas. Instaló su tienda en un espacio amplio de su vivienda, allí recibe a sus clientes, con quienes le gusta conversar. Además de las piñatas, también ofrece todo tipo de artículos para las fiestas infantiles, como globos, gorritos, etc. Lleva realizando este trabajo por más de 3 años, tiempo que le sirvió para hacerse conocida por la calidad del servicio que brinda. Antes de esto trabajaba para otras personas confeccionando las piñatas, lo que no le permitía tener buenos ingresos. Le está yendo muy bien y como toda mujer emprendedora tiene metas y sueños que en algún momento le gustaría realizar. Pero por ahora solo desea mantener su negocio para seguir juntando el capital suficiente para poder empezar a expandirlo.

Este es el crédito número 4 con MFP, por ello espera concretar sus planes. Se compromete, una vez más, a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en los anteriores créditos que tuvo. Y está muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal, ya que todos sus integrantes son muy responsables y solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado, 2000 soles, comprará más artículos para fiestas y los materiales necesarios para la confección de piñatas.
texts.en:
Nilda is 40 years old.  She is a very nice lady and the mother of two children: 13-year-old Yemilet and 7-year-old Frank.  Her children are the reason she works hard, as she would like to be able to offer them a better quality of life.  Nilda is married to 47-year-old Edson who is an electrician.  They inherited the house in which they live from her parents.

Nilda's business is making piñatas.  She set up her store in a large space in her home and this is where she greets her customers who she loves chatting to.  In addition to selling piñatas, she also sells all kinds of items for children's parties such as balloons, party hats, etc.  She has been in this business for more than three years and, during this period, she has become well known for her good-quality service.  Before she started this business she used to work for other people, making piñatas.  That work did not make her good income.  Her current business, however, is going very well and, in common with all entrepreneurial women, she has aims and dreams which she would like to fulfill.  However, for now she is focusing on continuing in her business so that she can continue putting together enough money to expand it.

This is Nilda's fourth loan from MFP and she hopes to be able to carry out her plans.  She pledges, once again, to make her repayments on time as she did with her previous loans.  She is very happy to belong to her community bank because all the members are very responsible and supportive people.

Nilda will use the 2,000 soles she has requested to buy more party supplies and the materials she needs to make piñatas.

loans.use: to buy party supplies and materials for making piñatas

loans.name: Vardan

texts.ru:
Вардан занимается сельскохозяйственным бизнесом на протяжении 10 лет. Он арендует участок земли в деревне Каджаран, Сьюникского региона, где выращивает овощи, в основном картофель, на продажу. А в городе Мегри (Meghri) Вардан выращивает фрукты: гранаты, инжир и персики. Выращенные овощи и фрукты Вардан реализует в городах Ереване, Капане и Каджаране. 
Также у Вардана имеется культиватор, при помощи которого он вспахивает землю для жителей города Каджарана за оплату. Для увеличения доходов своей семьи Вардан хочет купить ручную сенокосилку, которая позволит ему косить сено также за оплату. Для этой цели Вардану необходим кредит в размере 650.000 драм.
Вардану 46 лет и он проживает в городе Каджаране со своей женой, дочерью и сыном. Жена Вардана работает на комбинате города Каджарана, дочь недавно окончила школу, а сын еще учится в школе.
texts.en: Vardan has been involved in an agricultural business for ten years.  He leases a plot of land in the Kadjaran village in the Syunik region, where he grows vegetables and fruits, primarily potatoes, for sale.  Vardan also grows fruits, such as pomegranates, figs and peaches, in the city of Meghri.  He sells fruits and vegetables in the cities of Yerevan, Kapan and Kadjaran.  Vardan also has a cultivator, with the help of which he plows soil for the residents of Kadjaran for pay.  Vardan wants to buy a manual grass mower, which would allow him to cut hay also for pay in order to increase his family's income.  This is why Vardan needs a loan in the amount of 650,000 dram.  Vardan is 46 years old, and he lives in Kadjaran with his wife, daughter and son.  Vardan's wife works at a Kadjaran factory, daughter recently finished school, and son still attends school.

loans.use: to buy a manual grass mower

loans.name: Mudasirkhon

texts.ru:
Мудасирхон проживает в городе Исфара. Мудасирхон разведена. Она живет вместе с родителями. Ей 42 года. У нее двое детей. Мударисхон занимается торговлей сухофруктов. В основном она занимается переработкой и продажей кураги. Мудасирхон имеет богатый опыт в этой области. Она более пятнадцати лет занимается торговлей. 
Мудасирхон просит кредит для покупки сухофруктов и абрикосов. Она надеется на лучшее.
texts.en: Mudasirkhon lives in the city of Isfara.  She is divorced and lives with her parents.  She is 42 years old and has two children.  Mudasirkhon is involved in selling dried fruits.  She primarily processes and sells apricots.  Mudasirkhon has a rich experience in this field.  She has been in sales for over fifteen years.  Mudasirkhon is requesting this loan to purchase dried fruits and apricots.  She hopes for the best.

loans.use: to purchase dried fruits and apricots

loans.name: Nidia Marilu

texts.es: Nidia es socia del Banco Comunal Rikchariy  II. Tiene 38 años de edad, es casada y es madre de 4 hijos. Es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 5 años. Se dedica al alquiler de aparatos topográficos (nivel, teodolito, estación). Está agradecida con la institución por las facilidades de préstamo que ofrece. Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal es que le enseñaron a ahorrar y las capacitaciones porque cada una de ellas le enseña algo que aplica en su negocio o en su familia. En las reuniones de su Banco Comunal conoció a muchas amigas con las cuales comparte e intercambia sus diferentes experiencias de vida. Su sueño es formar una empresa constructora. Nidia invertirá el préstamo que solicita en el acabado de una oficina de trabajo donde funciona su negocio.
texts.en:
Nidia is a member of the communal bank Rikchariy II.  She is 38 years old, is married, and is a mother of four children.  She has been a member of FINCA Perú for five years.  She has a business that rents out topographic equipment (machinery for leveling and surveying).  

She is grateful to the institution for the ease with which she is able to obtain a loan.  What she likes most about the communal banks is that they taught her how to save, and she appreciates all of the training sessions, because each one teaches her something that she can apply in her business or family life.  Through the communal bank meetings she has made many friends, who share their life experiences with each other.  Her dream is to start a construction business.  

She will use the loan proceeds to finish constructing an office for her business.

loans.use: to finish building an office for her business.

loans.name: Mahmudjon

texts.ru:
Махмудчон родился 1983 году в районе Шахритус. Он уже не первый раз получает кредит в нашей организации. Махмудчон успел убедиться в эффективности наших кредитных услуг и решил снова обратиться за помощью. Предыдущий кредит он использовал для приобретения запчастей велосипедов, за счет чего у него увеличилось количество клиентов.  
В этот раз Махмудчон берет кредит в размере 8 000 сомони для покупки запчастей и хозяйственных товаров. Он хочет увеличить ассортимент своего товара, чтобы не потерять постоянных клиентов. Махмудчон трудолюбивый и порядочный гражданин Таджикистана. Он готов работать днем и ночью, чтобы обеспечить свою семью.
texts.en: Mahmudjon was born in 1983 in the Shahrituz district.  This is not his first time obtaining a loan from our organization.  Mahmudjon was able to see the effectiveness of our credit service and decided to request assistance again.  He used his previous loan to buy bicycle spare parts, which helped him to increase his customer base.  This time, Mahmudjon is requesting a loan in the amount of 8,000 somoni to buy spare parts and household goods.  He wants to expand the selection of his merchandise in order to retain regular clients.  Mahmudjon is a hardworking and decent citizen of Tajikistan.  He is prepared to work day and night to provide for his family.

loans.use: to purchase bicycle spare parts and household goods

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.ru:
Благодаря предыдущему кредиту Татьяна расширила ассортемент обуви и увеличила торговый оборот. На этот раз Татьяна просит предоставить ей кредит на закупку легких женских босоножек, которые называются "лодочки" и очень популярны в этом сезоне.

Татьяна очень ответственная, у нее не было ни одного дня опоздания по кредиту.

В этом году сын Татьяны поступает в колледж и ему нужна финансовая поддержка мамы. Татьяна надеется, что ее бизнес будет успешным и она сможет заработать достаточно, чтобы помочь сыну.
texts.en: Thanks to her previous loan, Tatyana expanded the selection of shoes and increased goods turnover.  This time, she is requesting a loan to purchase light women's sandals, called pumps, which are very popular during this season.  Tatyana is very responsible.  She never had a late loan payment.  This year, Tatyana's son is starting college and needs financial help from his mother.  Tatyana hopes that her business will be successful and that she would be able to earn enough to help her son.

loans.use: to purchase popular women's sandals

loans.name: Tegla

texts.en:
Tegla is a 52-year-old married woman. She has seven children, ranging from 12 years to 28 years. She describes herself to be an influential woman.

She operates a dairy farm where she sells milk . She has been involved in this business for five years and has one employee. Her business is located in a good business area, and her primary customers are local residents. She will use the KES 5,800 loan to buy a solar lantern for family use. 

She says her biggest business challenge is the lack of transportation for getting her milk to customers. 

Her business goal is to improve her business by changing the grade of her cows to zero grazing within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be a horticulture farmer .

loans.use: to buy a solar lantern for family use.

loans.name: Loida

texts.es:
Loida tiene 44 años, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa con muchas ganas de salir adelante.  Su pareja es Moisés, quien se dedica al comercio, fruto de esa unión tienen cuatro hijos. La casa donde viven es propia, la compraron a base de mucho esfuerzo.

Su actividad es la venta de comestibles y abarrotes de primera necesidad. Para eso acondicionó una bodega en su vivienda hace más de 4 años, con un capital propio. Vio una oportunidad de negocio y la necesidad de sus vecinos, y luego fue creciendo con préstamos de MFP. Además cuenta con la ayuda de su hijo en la atención a los clientes. Le gusta su negocio, pues le permite tener un ingreso económico para solventar sus gastos y estar en la comodidad de su casa para cuidar de sus menores hijos. El problema es cuando llueve constantemente, eso dificulta el acceso, pues se malogran las calles por el barro que se forma, pero eso no la desanima. 

Este es su préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP,  por tanto espera continuar con sus objetivos. Se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual como en créditos anteriores. 
Con el monto solicitado, de 4000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceites, fideos y otros, en mayor volumen, a precio por mayor para así tener mayores ganancias. También comprará gaseosas y golosinas para surtir su negocio.
texts.en:
Loida, 44, is a hard-working woman, an entrepreneur with a strong drive to get ahead in the world.  She and her partner, Moises, a merchant, have four children.  They live in a house that they scrimped and saved to buy.

Loida operates a corner grocery where she sells the everyday products that her customers want.  She used her own savings to start the business 4 years ago and operates it now from a space in her house.  She saw that there was demand for a grocery in the neighborhood and she's grown it with MFP loans.  Her son helps her with the business.  She tells us that she likes owning her own business because it provides an extra income for paying household bills and making improvements to her house.  Her biggest problem is the weather.  Rain is common here and the roads turn to mud when they're wet, something that makes access to her store difficult.  She never lets problems get her down, though.

This is Loida's fourth MFP loan and she says that she is grateful for your support because it will help her to carry on her business.  She is committed to repaying this loan in the agreed-upon time, just as she's done with past loans.  Loida will use your 4000-soles loan to buy bulk supplies of the products she sells--rice, sugar, cooking oil, pasta, etc.--so that she can get them at the lowest cost.  She will buy snacks and sodas that she will sell, as well.

loans.use: to stock her grocery business.

loans.name: Sulejka

texts.es:
Sulejka tiene 42 años, es una mujer trabajadora, emprendedora y muy dinámica. Su pareja es Justo, de 48 años, con quien tienen tres hijos: Iván de 15 años, Ximena de 11 y la menor, Saori de un año. Juntos, viven en la casa de sus suegros.
Su actividad es la venta de comida rápida, como salchipapas, pollo broaster, arroz chaufa y otros. La venta la realiza en el frontis de su vivienda; desde muy temprano inicia su labor, cuando va al mercado en busca de los mejores ingredientes, una vez en su casa comienza a preparar sus deliciosos platos que le han hecho muy conocida en su barrio. Lleva realizando este trabajo por más de 2 años y lo hace con la ayuda de su hermana. Lo considera rentable porque le genera buenos ingresos económicos, pues antes de esto trabajaba para otras personas y tenía muchas dificultades, ya que no tenía buenos ingresos económicos y siempre sufría para pagar algunos gastos del hogar, pero decidió que era momento de empezar su negocio propio y ser independiente.  Ahora le está yendo mucho mejor y desea seguir creciendo y convertirse en una prospera empresaria.

Este es el crédito número 6 que tiene con MFP y está muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, pues así se siente segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por su parte, se compromete, una vez más, a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual, como lo hizo en sus créditos anteriores. Y está muy feliz de pertenecer a su banco comunal, ya que todos sus integrantes son muy amables y solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado, 1000 soles, comprará ingredientes para la preparación de sus platillos; papas, aceite en cajas y otros en mayor volumen, para seguir realizando su trabajo. También necesita refaccionar algunas sillas y mesas para atender mejor a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sulejka is 42 years old.  She is a hard-working, entrepreneurial, dynamic lady.  Her partner is 48-year-old Justo and the couple have three children: 15-year-old Iván, 11-year-old Ximena and 1-year-old Saori.  They live together in her in-laws' home.

Sulejka's business is selling fast food such as salchipapas, fried chicken, fried rice, etc.  She makes her sales outside her home.  She starts work very early in the morning, going to the market to find the best ingredients.  Once home again, she starts preparing her delicious dishes which have become very well known in her neighborhood.  She has been in this business for more than two years and she works with the help of her sister.  She considers her business to be profitable because it makes her good income.  Before this, she used to work for other people and had a lot of problems because she didn't make good income and always had difficulty in meeting some of her household expenses. However, she decided that it was the right time to start her own business and become independent.  She is now doing much better and would like to continue growing her business.  She would like to become a prosperous businesswoman.

This is Sulejka's sixth loan from MFP and she is very happy to know that she has financial support because it makes her feel secure in making progress in her business.  She pledges, once again, to make her repayments on time as she has done with her previous loans.  She is very happy to belong to her community bank because all the members are very friendly and supportive.

Sulejka will use the 1,000 soles she has requested to buy ingredients for preparing some of her dishes.  She will buy potatoes, oil and other supplies in bulk.  This will allow her to continue in her business.  She also needs to refurbish some tables and chairs in order to provide her customers with a better service.

loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients for making food.  She will also refurbish some tables and chairs

loans.name: Al-Jwahr Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Jwahr.  It consists of five ladies named Gdria, Ameena, Johra, Fawziah and Afaf.  They live in Hadramout, Yemen. 

Johra, who is 49 years old, lives with her family in Hadramout, Yemen.  She sells vegetables, including tomatoes, peppers and onions, in addition to others.  She has been in this business for one year and has a lot of experience in sales.  People prefer her because she always has what they need, offering a quality product and affordable prices in addition to good service. 

Johra is an entrepreneurial woman with a great desire to get ahead.  She is always looking for new opportunities because she wants to be successful.  For some time she has wanted to expand her business by investing in inputs, but she did not have enough capital.  For that reason, she is requesting a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy vegetables, including tomatoes, peppers and onions, and fruits, including apples and bananas.  She has good references and is very responsible.  She is also confident that her family will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables for her business

loans.name: Taher

texts.en:
Taher is from Gaza.  He is 30 years old and married, with one child.

Taher has owned a grocery store since the beginning of 2012.  What makes his store special is that it is the only one in the area.

Taher asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy shelves, a refrigerator, and a glass door for the grocery store. After taking the loan, he will be able to increase the goods displayed and increase his income.

His ambition is to own a big supermarket and provide his wife and child with a better life.

loans.use: to buy shelves, a refrigerator, and a glass door for his grocery store.

loans.name: Abed El Wahed

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 47 years old and married, with three children.

Abed El Wahed has owned a food market since 2009, selling soft drinks, juices, cheese, dairy products, snacks, and detergents. He has sufficient experience in this field and a deep understanding of local customers.  He knows their demands. He has a good reputation and is being well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a $2,400 loan in order to buy four refrigerators. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy four refrigerators for his store.

loans.name: Tomasa Aquilina

texts.es: Tomasa es socia del Banco Comunal Ccatun Sacha. Tiene 57 años y es madre de 6 hijos. Es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 15 años. Se dedica a la compra y venta  de tara, cochinilla, y también vende hojas medicinales de coca. Está agradecida con la institución por las facilidades de préstamo que le ofrece. Con su esfuerzo y sus ahorros ella logró construir su vivienda. Las capacitaciones que recibe en su Banco Comunal le ayudan a  mejorara tanto en el negocio como en su familia. Está feliz porque se siente una mujer exitosa. Tomasa invertirá el préstamo que solicita en la compra de tara y cochinilla.
texts.en: Tomasa is a member of the communal bank Ccatun Sacha. She is 57 years old and is a mother of four children. She has been a member of FINCA Perú for 15 years. She has a business buying and selling tara plants and cochinilla dye. She also sells medicinal coca leaves. She is grateful to the institution for the ease with which she is able to obtain a loan. Through her efforts and her savings she has been able to build the life that she wants. The training sessions she receives through the communal bank help her to make improvements both in her business and in her family life. She is very happy because she feels that she has been a very successful woman. She will invest the loan proceeds in tara plants and cochinilla dye.

loans.use: to buy tara plants and cochinilla dye.

loans.name: Muhabat

texts.ru:
Мухабат жительница района Кубодиен. Ей 45 лет. Мухабат живет с мужем. Ее муж пенсионер. Сыновья находятся на заработках за рубежом. Сама Мухабат не хочет ждать материальной помощи у детей и намерена сама начать свою деятельность. Ее муж поддерживает ее решение.  
Мухабат взяла в аренду торговую точку на центральном рынке района. Она хочет заняться торговлей детской и подростковой одежды. Мухабат просит кредит для покупки детской одежды (костюмчиков, наборов для новорожденных и детей до школьного возраста) и школьной формы. Так как сейчас большой спрос на школьную одежду, Мухабат намерена закупить одежду для школьников. Она надеется на Вашу помощь.
texts.en: Muhabat is a resident of the Qubadiyon district.  She is 45 years old and lives with her husband, who is retired.  Their sons are working abroad.  Muhabat does not want to wait for her children to help her and intends to start her own business.  Her husband supports her decision.  Muhabat leased a retail outlet at the district's central market.  She wants to get involved in selling children's and adolescent clothing.  Muhabat is requesting this loan to buy children's clothing (suits and sets for newborn and preschool children) and school uniforms.  Because there is a high demand for school clothing now, Muhabat intends to purchase clothing for school children.  She relies on your help.

loans.use: to purchase children's clothing and school uniforms

loans.name: Nurinisso

texts.ru:
Нуриннисо родилась 1977 году в районе Кубодиен. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Ее муж находится на заработках в Российской Федерации, а дети учатся в средней школе. Сама Нуриниссо занимается торговлей. Она самостоятельная и жизнерадостная женщина. 
Нуриниссо уже шесть месяцев занимается торговлей на рынке. У нее имеется собственная торговая точка, где она продает женскую одежду. Нуриниссо берет кредит для покупки детской одежды. Таким образом Нуриниссо хочет увеличить товарооборот.
texts.en: Nurinisso was born in 1977 in the Qubadiyon district.  She is married and has two children.  Her husband is working in the Russian Federation, and children attend a secondary school.  Nurinisso is involved in sales.  She is an independent and happy woman.  Nurinisso has been involved in sales at a market for six months.  She owns a retail outlet, where she sells women's clothing.  She is requesting this loan to buy children's clothing.  This is how Nurinisso wants to increase her goods turnover.

loans.use: to purchase children's clothing

loans.name: Araz

texts.ru: Araz nachal svoy biznes 4 goda nazad. On prodayet moloko, sir I drugie molochnie produkti v rayone gde on jivet. U Araza stoylo kotoriy on planiruet perestroit tak kak etot uje razvalivaetsa. Segodna on obratilsa za kreditom dla togo chtobi kupit korm dla skota. Eto pomojet uvelicheniu ejednevnogo polucheniya moloka I razvitiu biznesa. Arazu 32 goda, on jenat, u nego dvoe malenkix detey pyati I trex let.
texts.en: Araz started his business four years ago.  He sells milk, cheese and other dairy products in the district where he lives.  Araz has a barn that he plans to rebuild because it is falling apart.  Today, he requested a loan to purchase livestock feed.  This would help him to increase the daily volume of milk and develop his business.  Araz is 32 years old, married and has two small children, who are five and three years old.

loans.use: to purchase animal feed

loans.name: Aasia's Group

texts.en:
Aasia has requested a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s fruit selling business.  He gets up early in the morning and starts selling the fruit on his cart by visiting different streets in the city.  Aasia supports him by arranging the fruit on his cart.  With this loan, he will buy fresh seasonal fruit in order to offer better quality fruit to his clients and increase both his sales and his income.

He has been operating his business for some time now and Aasia is confident that the loan will enable him to be more productive and increase his income.

loans.use: to buy fruit for her husband's fruit selling business

loans.name: Lucia Edna

texts.es: Lucia es socia del Banco Comunal Ccatun Sacha. Tiene 35 años de edad, es madre de un hijo y se encuentra en la dulce espera de un nuevo bebé. Es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 1 año. Se dedica a la venta de cosméticos por catálogo. Nos comenta que la institución le ofrece facilidades de préstamo por lo cual se encuentra agradecida. Las capacitaciones que recibe en su Banco Comunal le ayudan a actuar de forma adecuada tanto con sus clientes y en el entorno familiar. Lucia invertirá el nuevo préstamo que solicita en la adquisición de más productos de belleza.
texts.en: Lucia, 35, is a member of the Ccatun Sacha community bank.  She has one child and tells us that she is happily expecting another.  She has been a FINCA Peru client for 1 year.  She operates a business buying and selling cosmetics.  She says that she likes our loan terms and adds that the training that she's received from the community bank have helped her as much at home as they have in her business.  Lucia will use this loan to stock her cosmetics supply business with products that she will resell.

loans.use: to stock her cosmetics sales business.

loans.name: Alex

texts.es:
Alex tiene 29 años, es un hombre muy trabajador y emprendedor, además de muy entusiasta para los negocios. Su pareja es Nanci, quien brinda servicios de belleza y es la madre de su hijo Anderson de 2 años. Juntos viven en la casa de sus suegros.

Él se dedica a la venta de madera aserrada. Para ello habilitó un local alquilado donde tiene todas las máquinas de aserrío y corte de madera. Compra la madera en tablones, luego las convierte en tablillas y las vende a buen precio. Lleva dedicándose a esta actividad alrededor de 3 años, con el apoyo de algunos ayudantes a quienes paga por semana trabajada. Ha logrado crecer a base de esfuerzo y dedicación; además le gusta, pues les brinda trabajo a otras personas y se siente muy contento con el apoyo que viene recibiendo de la institución MFP. Por tanto, desea continuar con su negocio y hacerlo crecer.

Este es su primer préstamo y comenta que se encuentra muy cómodo con este banco comunal, pues no ha tenido ningún problema y considera que son personas puntales y piensa seguir perteneciendo al grupo.
Con el préstamo solicitado, de 1000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de madera de diversas variedades, en tablones. De esa manera aumentará su stock y podrá seguir sacando tablillas para la venta.
texts.en:
Alex, 29, is a hard-working man and passionate about building his business.  His partner, Nanci, has a beauty salon and the couple has a 2-year old son, Anderson.  They live with Alex's in-laws.

Alex operates a lumber business.  He has a workshop where he keeps the saws that he uses to cut wood into smaller pieces.  He buys sheets of wood and cuts them into strips so that he can get the best price for them.  He has operated the business for 3 years and employs a few workers who he pays by the week.  He has worked hard to build the business and says that he likes being able to provide work to others.  He says, too, that he is grateful for the support that he's received from MFP and wants to carry on the business and grow it.

This is Alex's first loan and he tells us that he is happy with his community bank.  He hasn't had any problems and considers the other members to be reliable.  He adds that he wants to continue with the group.
Alex will use your 1000 new soles loan to buy sheets of different kinds of wood.  The investment will allow him to stock the supplies he needs to carry on the business.

loans.use: to stock his lumber business.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 33 years old.  He is married and has three children who attend school.  He runs a cybercafé and has been in this business for four years.  He earns a monthly income of 20,000 KES.

This is will be his first loan from KADET LTD.  Peter plans to use the entire loan to purchase a photocopier and two computers. 

He plans to reinvest the anticipated profit into the business.  He also hopes to expand his business and open a computer college in the future.

loans.use: to buy a photococopy machine and two computers

loans.name: Alipio Jr.

texts.en:
Alipio is a 41-year-old married man and the father of two children, from Bohol, Philippines. He has sold snack food in the community for almost ten years now. 

Alipio lacks the capital for his business to grow and become sustainable. He is requesting a loan of PHP 6,000 to buy additional ingredients for tempura and fish balls, such as flour, cooking oil, and seasonings.  Some of the loan will be used for the renovation of his house.

Alipio believes that if he is provided support financially, he will be able to improve his business and increase his income. Moreover, he wants to continually send his children to school for better learning. Alipio dreams of nothing but to see his family enjoy the fullness of life.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients for the snacks he sells.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace sells cooked rice and kenkey (like a sourdough dumpling) near Kwarhinkrom. She has received an education through the primary level.  She is married and has five children. Her husband is a farmer. 

Grace has been selling cooked rice and kenkey for 20 years. She uses her income to pay her children’s school fees.  

She will use her loan to buy raw rice in bulk. Grace hopes to use the new profits to reinvest in her business and fund her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy raw rice in bulk.

loans.name: Meyling Angelina

texts.es: Meyling está finalizando su carrera de Contador, está solicitando el crédito para pagar el curso de titulación y así poder finalizar sus estudios universitarios. Para ella es muy importante obtener su título ya que las ofertas de trabajo tienen como requisito el título universitario. Desea poder conseguir un mejor trabajo con mayor renumeración. Ella está pagando sus estudios con los ingresos que percibe de su empleo.
texts.en: Meyling is in the final year of an Accounting course.  She is applying for a loan that she will use to pay her university fees so she can finish her degree.  She says that she has to finish her degree because any future job that she wants will require that she have one.  She wants a better job so that she can earn more.  She is paying for her studies with the income that she receives from her [current?] job.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Nena

texts.es:
Nena tiene 57 años, es una mujer muy valiente y emprendedora. Tiene seis hijos, a quienes cuida y da educación hasta que ellos puedan ser independientes. Vive en su casa propia, a lado de su esposo Emilio, de 56 años, quien es docente y es quien le brinda las fuerzas para seguir  trabajando para tener una mejor calidad de vida.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de segundo uso, de toda variedad, para damas, caballeros y niños. Su mercadería la compra en el centro comercial de su ciudad por fardos y la lleva a vender por las rivera del río en los caseríos y zonas alejadas. Se inició con esta actividad por la idea e iniciativa de su esposo, quien es profesor en un caserío. Aunque su trabajo le resulta un poco pesado, por los viajes que realiza, y porque tiene que cargar su mercadería ella sola, sabe que debe esforzarse al máximo. A pesar que vende mucho, a ella le gustaría tener mayores ganancias y vender en mayor volumen. Por eso, desea seguir trabajando y hacer crecer su negocio.

Este es el crédito número 12 que tiene con MFP, por tanto espera continuar con sus objetivos. Por su parte, se compromete, una vez más, a cumplir con sus cuotas de pago como en sus créditos anteriores. Y está muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal, ya que todos sus integrantes son personas muy amables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado, 1000 soles, comprará mayor cantidad de ropa usadas en fardos, buscando precios bajos por sus compras en volumen.
texts.en:
Nena, 57, is a brave, hardworking woman. She has six children and will care for and educate them until they can go off on their own. She lives in her own house with her husband Emilio, 56, who is a teacher. It is Emilio who gives her the strength to keep working toward a better life.

She sells secondhand clothing of all sorts, for women, men, and children. She buys her merchandise by the bale in the market in her city and sells it in the villages and other farflung areas. Her husband, who teaches in one of the villages, inspired her to start the business. Because she has to travel a lot and transport the merchandise by herself, the work can be difficult. She has to give it all her effort. Although she already sells a lot, she would like to increase her income and have a greater volume of sales. That's why she wants to keep working and expand her business.

This will be her twelfth loan with MFP, and she is hoping to be able to pursuing her goals. She is committed once again to making her payments on time, as she did for previous loans. She is also happy to be part of a village bank because all the other members are very friendly, supportive people.

She will use the amount requested—1000 soles—to buy more bundles of secondhand clothing, looking for low prices for her bulk purchases.

loans.use: to buy bales of secondhand clothing for her business.

loans.name: Babir

texts.ru: Babiru 45 let, on jivet s jenoy I 3 detmi, 2 iz nix xodat v shkolu, starshiy rebenok pomogaet emu vesti biznes. U nego prodaja jivotnix I molochnix produktov. Babir uje 19 let zanimaetsa skotovodstvom I vpolne preuspel v svoem dele. On xochet uvelichit chislo jivotnix I rasshirit svoy biznes. Babir xochet vzat kredit v 1500 AZN dla pokupki 2 ovec.
texts.en: Babir is 45 years old and lives with his wife and three children, two of whom attend a school and the oldest child helps him to run his business.  Babir sells livestock and milk products.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for 19 years and is quite successful in his business.  He wants to increase the quantity of his livestock and develop his business.  Babir wants to obtain a loan in the amount of 1500 AZN to buy two sheep.

loans.use: to buy two sheep

loans.name: Nasreen's Group

texts.en:
Nasreen is the mother of two sons and a daughter. All three of them are enrolled in school and getting their education.

She knows sewing and works for her neighborhood clients to financially support her husband, who is an embroidery expert.
She is very creative in her work and receives regular orders every month.

She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband, who will buy beads, thread, and embroidery frames in larger quantity and of better quality. This will help him prepare better-looking clothes and increase his orders and income.

Nasreen is very much hopeful about the business success of her husband after investing the loan.

loans.use: To buy embroidery materials and frames.

loans.name: Luis Benito

texts.es: En la ciudad de Quevedo vive Luis, tiene 35 años y es panificador. Esta felizmente unido y su esposa es quien le ayuda en el negocio, tienen 2 hijos quienes estudian en el colegio fiscal. Hace varios años abrió una panadería en la parte frontal de su domicilio donde tiene una vitrina para mostrar sus productos y en la parte trasera el horno. Su labor empieza desde las 3 de la mañana hasta las 11 de la noche que cierra, abriendo todos los días, la labor la realiza solo ya que se necesita de fuerza física para el proceso del amasado al momento de meter al horno su esposa le ayuda. Aprendió la panificación por la enseñanza de uno de sus familiares, como le gusto el negocio decidió abrir su local propio. Luis no ha tenido mayores inconvenientes, ni con la delincuencia ni con el ministerio de Salud ente regulador que brinda los permisos de funcionamiento al tratarse de consumo alimenticio. Con el crédito Luis comprar manteca, harina, huevos, una mesa y otra vitrina. Espera con el tiempo poder ganar dinero para realizarle arreglos a su casa.
texts.en:
Luis is a baker who is 35 years old and lives in the city of Quevedo. He loves his wife very much, and she helps him at their bakery business. They have two children who are in school. Several years ago, they opened a bakery in the front portion of their house, where they have a display case and window to show and sell products. At the back of the house is the oven. Luis begins work at 3:00 in the morning to prepare and bake his products, and he does not close the bakery until 11:00 at night. His bakery is open every day of the week, and he works very hard by himself to knead and make all the dough necessary for his baked goods. When the items are ready to go in the oven, his wife helps him. He learned this craft from one of his family members, and since he liked their business, he decided to open a business of his own.

Luis has not had major setbacks, not even from crime and vandalism, or from the Ministry of Health, whose permission is necessary to obtain operating permits. With the support from this loan, Luis plans to purchase butter, flour, eggs, a table and another cabinet for his bakery. He hopes, in time, to be able to save up money to repair his home.

loans.use: to purchase butter, flour, eggs, a table and another cabinet for his bakery.

loans.name: Orostakhon

texts.ru: Оростахон молодая женщина, она вдова и мать двоих детей.Работает  в аэропорту финансистом.У неё взрослая дочь и сын которые учатся в России.К сожалению её муж умер недавно и она воспитывает детей  со своей матерью.Они вместе живут.Оростхон хотя немного затрудняется в содержании семьи и обучении детей за пределами города,она смело смотрит в будущее, что скоро дети поддержат её после окончания вуза.Так как её бытовые условия немного ухудшились, она хочет отремонтировать квартиру и поэтому обратилась к нам за финансовой помощью.Заранее благодарит нас за поддержку.
texts.en: Orostakhon is a young woman.  She is a widow and a mother of two children.  She works as a financial analyst at the airport.  Orostakhon has a grown daughter and son, both of whom are studying in Russia.  Unfortunately, her husband recently passed away, and she is raising the children together with her mother.  All of them live together.  Although, it is a bit hard for Orostakhon to support her family and educate her children outside the city limits, she looks bravely toward the future, knowing that her children will soon support her after finishing their education.  Because her household conditions slightly worsened, Orostakhon wants to make repairs to her apartment, and this is why she requested financial help from us.  She thanks us for the support in advance.

loans.use: to make repairs to her apartment

loans.name: Toshpulot

texts.ru: Тошпулот мужчина в возрасте 50 лет, женат имеет восьмерых детей.Сам занимается дехканским хозяйством по посеву арахиса.Кроме этой работы он так же откармливает скот. Он имеет доход от купли и продажи скота. В основном он покупает крупно рогатый скот. Тошпулот сотрудничает с нашей  организацией уже девятый год, и за весь период сотрудничества он увеличил численность скота в несколько раз.На полученный кредит Тошпулот хочет купить скот и корм для скота. Он выражает огромную благодарность нашей организации за поддержку и финансирование.
texts.en: Toshpulot is a 50 year-old man, married and has eight children.  He is involved in a dekhan business, sowing peanuts.  Besides this work, he also fattens up livestock.  He has an income from buying and selling livestock.  He primarily buys cattle.  Toshpulot has been partnering with our organization for the ninth year now and increased his livestock quantities several fold during this period.  Toshpulot wants to use this loan to buy livestock and livestock feed.  He expresses a sincere gratitude to our organization for the support and financing.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and feed

loans.name: Gulsunjon

texts.en:
Gulsunjon is a woman with a wonderful nature. She wants to live in a wonderful house but her house is in a bad condition. She works hard to repair her house but her income from animal husbandry is small. She is one of the best businesswomen - she has worked for more than 15 years and has enough experience. She has a very friendly family and her husband helps her with the business. They have a child and want to comfort him with all the modern conveniences. 

Gulsunjon is asking for a loan to buy building materials to repair her house. She waits for your help and support.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Khatuna

texts.en:
Khatuna is 36 years old. She lives in a small village of Dusheti District with her parents, who are pensioners. Khatuna is busy with an agricultural business. She has 2 milking cows and produces dairy food: cheese, curd, and yogurt. Part of the dairy food is used by the family members and the rest is sold on the local open market. The total average monthly income of the family is 500 Lari.

Khatuna requested a loan for purchasing an additional milking cow. She wants to expand her agricultural activity in order to make it more profitable. With three milking cows, she will be able to produce more dairy food. This will increase the income of the family. With increased income, Khatuna will be able to reinvest in her agricultural business. As a result of the above-mentioned activity, the living conditions of the family will improve.

loans.use: to purchase a milking cow.

loans.name: Nerith

texts.es:
Nerith tiene 53 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora. Vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Jeremías, de 54 años, y su hija Anais de 19 años, a quien desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Tuvo en total siente hijos, pero los otros ya son mayores e independientes.

Su trabajo es la venta de flores naturales y artificiales en un pequeño puesto en el cementerio general de su localidad. Adicionalmente, vende refrescos helados en su vivienda, de lo que se encarga su hija. Se inicio en el negocio de las flores hace más de 8 años y le gusta mucho porque disfruta de conversar con las otras vendedoras. Antes de iniciar con esta actividad  tenía problemas económicos, ahora  le está yendo muy bien, aunque todavía no se siente realizada. Desea implementar una tienda a la venta de flores, ya que siente que es momento de empezar a crecer y tener un local propio.

Este es su tercer crédito con MFP, por tanto cuenta con este apoyo financiero para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, se compromete a seguir siendo una socia puntual y cumplida, como en los créditos anteriores que tuvo.  
Con los 2000 soles solicitados comprará más flores artificiales, comprará seis cajas, valorizadas en 200 nuevos soles cada una. También invertirá en el negocio de refrescos, con la compra de los insumos que usa para la preparación.
texts.en: Nerith is 53 years old and is a very friendly and hardworking woman. She lives in her own home with her husband Jeremías, who is 54, and their daughter Anais, who is 19. They hope to be able to provide their daughter with a better quality of life. They have six other adult children who are now living independently. She makes her living selling real and artificial flowers from her small stand in her local cemetery. Additionally, she sells frozen drinks from her home, which her daughter is in charge of. She started the flower business more than eight years ago, and she likes it very much because she enjoys talking to the other vendors. Before starting this activity she had financial problems. Now things are going very well, although she feels there is still more she wants to achieve. She wants to open her own floral shop, and she feels that now is the time to go into business for herself. This is her third loan from MFP. She is counting on this support to be able to continue toward her goals. She promises to repay her loans fully and punctually, as she has with her past loans. With the 2000 soles she is seeking, she will buy six boxes of artificial flowers, which cost 200 soles each. She will also invest in her business selling frozen drinks, purchasing the ingredients she needs in order to make them.

loans.use: to buy six boxes of artificial flowers, and also to invest in her other business selling frozen drinks.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is 22 years old and is from Gaza. He has a food stall for selling different kinds of fruits and vegetables. He's had this business for 2 years.

Mahmoud asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy a small automobile and an electrical scale. He hopes that his sales will increase and his transportation budget will decrease after buying the automobile and the scale, which will help buy more goods and increase his income.

loans.use: to buy a small automobile and an electrical scale.

loans.name: Khouth

texts.en:
Khouth is 47 years old and married with a single child who attends a local school. Khouth is an industrious farmer who pays full attention to agricultural businesses including rice husbandry and hog-raising. In addition, she uses her spare time at home to manage a small store selling sweets and packaged biscuits and spices, from which she can pay for her daily food. Uplifting her family out of poverty and educating her child to the college level are her priorities.

To improve her business activities, Khouth would like to take out a loan of KHR 4,000,000 from Kiva lenders. She will divide this loan into three portions, which will be used for each business. She will invest in her rice business, install more piglets for fattening, and purchase merchandise to increase her store such as spices, cooking ingredients, cigarettes, shampoos, and other home use products. She has a strong belief in developing her current businesses. Her patience and hard work will lead her to success in the future.

loans.use: to invest in her rice business, to install more piglets for fattening, and to purchase merchandise to increase her store such as spices, cooking ingredients, cigarettes, shampoos, and other home use products.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is married with one child and her child doesn’t go to school. She doesn’t take care of additional family members. She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and no piped water.

Sarah has a business selling used clothes and sells to all categories of people but on retail. She has applied for a loan of 300,000 Ugandan Shillings to buy more bales of used clothes. She moves door to door selling used clothes and has been in the clothing business for 4 years. She works 6 days a week and sells on a retail basis only. 

Sarah's major business challenges include debtors and seasonality. Her monthly expenses include rent and school fees. She hopes to see her business increase so that she can get a permanent business premise and also build her own house.

loans.use: to buy more bales of used clothes.

loans.name: Mame Loty

texts.fr: Madame Mame Loty est une femme mariée qui vit sur le territoire sénégalais. Elle s’active dans le secteur du commerce depuis plus de 15 ans. Elle pratique la vente de légumes qui lui génère des bénéfices grâce  auxquels elle  gère ses besoins quotidiens. Elle est en possession  d’une maison où elle a entamé des constructions. Elle sollicite un crédit de 500000frs dans le guichet de l’U-IMCEC ou elle est membre. Elle  a déjà remboursé 6 prêts  antérieurs. Ce financement lui permettra d’améliorer le cadre de vi de sa progéniture.
texts.en:
Madame Mame Loty is married, and lives in Senegal. She has been a retailer for 15 years. She sells vegetables, generating profits that she uses for her everyday expenses. 

Madame Loty owns a house and has begun making some improvements. She is asking for a loan of 500,000 francs from the U-IMCEC branch where she is a member. She has already repaid six previous loans. This new loan will allow her to improve her children's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina es socia del Banco Comunal Guadalupe. Tiene 40 años de edad y es madre de 3 hijos. Es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 5 años. Se dedica a la venta de cereales molidos. Ella dice que en su Banco Comunal aprendió a ahorrar y eso es lo que más le gusta, las capacitaciones que recibe son muy buenas ya que contienen temas que ayudan a uno para así poder mejorar en el negocio y en la vida familiar. Su meta es lograr terminar con el acabado de construcción de su vivienda. Marina invertirá el préstamo que solicita en la compra de cereales al por mayor y también para la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en: Marina is a member of the Guadalupe Comunal Bank. She is 40 years old and the mother of three. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for the past 5 years. She makes a living selling ground cereals. She said that she has learned from her communal bank how to save money, and that is the thing she likes most about the bank. The trainings that she receives are very good because they cover topics to help one improve their business as well as their family life. Her goal is to finish building her home. Marina will invest the loan that she has requested in purchasing cereals at wholesale and also for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy cereals at wholesale

loans.name: Elene

texts.en:
Elene is 36 years old. She is married and lives in a small village in the Kaspi District with her family: husband George and their three children who are 6, 10, and 12 years old. All three children study in the village school. Elene and George are busy with their agricultural business. They have four milking cows, three calves, and a pig. They produce cheese and curds and sell them in Tbilisi (the Capital of Georgia). They sell calves and piglets as well in nearby villages. 

Elene has requested a loan to purchase food for the cattle; Elene and George will use this food to feed their cattle during the fall and winter seasons. Hay is cheap now, but the price increases by 30-40% during the fall months. This will allow Elene to save significantly on the cost of feeding the cows. Since the cows will be fed properly through the winter, they will give a planned amount of milk to the family. The calves will also be fed properly and the grown calves will be able to be sold for a good price. This will increase the family's income. With the increased income, they will be able to reinvest in the family agricultural business in order to expand it and make more profitable. As a result, the living conditions of the family will improve.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her cattle.

loans.name: Aboud

texts.en:
Aboud is from Iraq. He is 46 years old and married, with seven children.

Aboud is the owner of a barber shop since 2011. He has sufficient experience in this field and a deep understanding of local customers, so he knows their needs. He has a good reputation and he is becoming well known in the surrounding areas.

Aboud has applied for $1200 loan to install an external ceiling and shutters in his shop. He also wants to make an advertising light box. He is aiming to develop his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to install an external ceiling and shutters.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel es socia del Banco Comunal Florecer. Tiene 37 años de edad, es casada y madre de 5 hijos. Es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 2 años. Se dedica a la venta de locería (vasos, platos, azafates) en zonas rurales de la ciudad. Maribel está agradecida con la institución por todas las facilidades de préstamo que le ofrece, dice que las capacitaciones que recibe en su Banco Comunal son muy buenas, de lo que mas se siente orgullosa es que aprendió a ahorrar. Su meta es que sus hijos tengan una buena educación. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de locerías al por mayor como platos, tazas, vasos, azafates, etc.
texts.en: Maribel is a member of the 'Florecer' community bank.  She is 37 years old, married, and the mother of five children.  She has been a member of FINCA Peru for two years.  Her business is selling home products such as cups, dishes and trays in rural areas of the city.  Maribel is grateful to the institution for all the loan facilities that they offer.  She says that the training she receives as a member of her community bank is very good.  The thing she feels most proud of is the fact that she has learned how to save.  Her goal is to provide her children with a good education.  She will invest the loan that she has requested in buying home products wholesale such as dishes, cups, glasses, trays, etc.

loans.use: to buy home products such as dishes, cups, glasses, trays, etc.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 21-year-old single Lebanese man. He lives with his two working siblings. He supports his two brothers as they all seek to live a proper life. They are responsible for managing the family expenses and taking care of their only parent. 

Mohammad started his own independent business in 2011. He works as a taxi driver, transporting clients from town to town upon request. He looks forward to gaining more clients. Today, he’s requesting a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to perform needed maintenance on his car and repair its wheels as well. This loan will allow him to boost his work, serve a wider range of people, and--most importantly--increase his earnings. Mohammad is a young and hard-working man, and this will help him achieve his goals in a short time period.

loans.use: to perform the needed maintenance on his car and repair its wheels as well.

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
Esther tiene 59 años, es una mujer que siempre ha luchado por sobresalir en la vida. Su pareja es Luis, quien es mecánico de motos, y con quien tiene cinco hijos que ya son mayores e independientes. Actualmente, vive en su casa propia en compañía de su pareja, dos de sus hijas y la pareja de una de ellas. 

Su trabajo es la costura, realiza diseño de ropa y costura a pedidos, su trabajo es muy solicitado en su barrio, ya que es la única que realiza esta actividad. Ella aprendió desde muy pequeña junto a su madre y estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional, ahora tiene su propio taller, empezó con una máquina de coser hace más de 44 años y hasta el momento lo viene realizando sola. Aún recuerda que cuando se inició tenía muchas dudas y dificultades, pero a base de esfuerzo y mucho trabajo pudo superarlo. Adicionalmente, se dedica al alquiler de habitaciones y locales comerciales.

Este es el crédito número 17 que tiene con MFP, por tanto espera continuar con sus objetivos. Además está muy comprometida en pagar, una vez más, las cuotas a tiempo y de manera responsable. Se siente muy cómoda en su banco comunal, ya que sus compañeros de grupo son muy responsables y siempre se solidarizan con los demás.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1000 nuevos soles, comprará materiales (telas, hilos, botones, cierres, elásticos y otros) para seguir con su trabajo de costura. También adquirirá algunos materiales de construcción para arreglar los cuartos que pone en alquiler.
texts.en:
Esther is 59 years old.  She is a woman who has always worked hard to do well in life.  Her partner is Luis, a motor mechanic.  The couple have five children who are already grown up and live independently.  Esther currently lives in her own home together with her partner, two of her daughters and one of their partners.

Esther works as a dressmaker.  She designs clothing and sews to order.  Her work is very much in demand in her neighborhood as she is the only person who does this work.  She learned the business from her mother at a very young age and also studied at a vocational center.  She now has her own workshop.  Esther started out with one sewing machine more than 44 years ago and has been working alone up to now.  She still recalls that when she started out she had a lot of doubts and difficulties but, thanks to her efforts and hard work, she was able to make progress.  In addition, she also rents out rooms and commercial premises.

This is Esther's 17th loan from MFP and she hopes to continue achieving her goals.  She pledges, once again, to make her repayments responsibly and on time.  She feels very comfortable within her community bank as her fellow group members are very responsible and supportive.

Esther will use the 1,000 soles she has requested to buy materials (fabric, threads, buttons, fasteners, elastic, etc.) so that she can continue in her dressmaking business.  She will also buy some construction supplies so that she can fix up some rooms that she rents out.

loans.use: to buy sewing materials and to fix up some rooms that she rents out

loans.name: Fawzi

texts.en: This is Fawzi, a 53-year-old married man from Lebanon. He lives with his wife and three children, who are still attending school. Unlike other women in her place, Fawzi’s wife cooperates with him to enhance their family’s financial situation. She strives to work really hard and doesn’t hesitate to offer help whenever needed.  As for Fawzi, he has owned a grocery store in his town since 2007. He has clients from all over the neighboring villages who pass by his shop to purchase their needs of food and provisions. Fawzi is very welcoming and friendly, which has contributed to his success at work. Today, he wants to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to buy supplementary products for his business. He’s sure that with the diversification of products, his sales will increase by minimum of 20%. This is how Fawzi works to better develop his business.

loans.use: to buy supplementary products for his business.

loans.name: Gloria Amanda

texts.es: Gloria es socia del Banco Comunal Guadalupe. Tiene 34 años de edad y es madre de tres hijos. Es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 1 año. Se dedica a la siembra y cosecha de tubérculos, y también vende quesos. Está agradecida con la institución por las facilidades de préstamo que le ofrece, ella dice que las capacitaciones que recibe en su Banco Comunal son muy buenas ya que contienen mensajes de superación y valoración para las personas. Su sueño es tener un carro para que pueda movilizarse junto a su familia y que también le ayude en su negocio. Gloria invertirá el nuevo préstamo que solicita en la compra de abono para la siembra de tubérculos.
texts.en: Gloria is a member of the Guadalupe communal bank. She is 34 years old and is the mother of three. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for one year. She makes a living planting and harvesting tubers, and she also sells cheese. She is thankful to the communal bank for the money lending services they offer. She says that the trainings that she receives from her communal bank are very good, with messages of how to overcome struggles and personal value. Her dream is to have a car so that she has transportation for her family and it would also be a help to her business. Gloria will invest the loan she has requested in buying fertilizer to plant tubers.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to plant tubers.

loans.name: Israel

texts.es:
Israel de veinte y seis  años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos. Él es una persona luchadora, desde hace 10 años se dedica a realizar trabajos agrícolas junto a sus padres. Poco tiempo después Israel, emigro a la ciudad a trabajar como empleado en una tienda, fue ahí donde se acompaño con su esposa. 

Israel solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar arena, cemento, hierro, pago de mano de obra, para realizarle mejoras a su vivienda proyecto que desea concretizar junto con su esposa. Esto lo hace con el objetivo de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, pues expresa que tendrán un hogar más cómodo para sus pequeñas hijas. Su deseo es proporcionarles el estudio a sus hijas e instalar un pequeño negocio dedicado a la venta de productos de la canasta básica como: fríjol, arroz, entre otros.
texts.en:
Israel is twenty six years old and lives together with his life partner and their two children.  He is a hard-working person who has been working in agriculture together with his parents for ten years.  Israel recently emigrated to the city to work as an employee in a store.  This is where he met his wife. 

Israel is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to buy sand, cement and iron.  He will also pay labor costs so that he can have some improvements made to his home.  He would like to carry out this work together with his wife so that they can improve the family's quality of life.  He says that this will give him a more comfortable home for his young daughters.  Israel's wish is to provide his daughters with an education and to set up a small business selling basic household products such as beans, rice, etc.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement and iron, and to pay labor costs

loans.name: Marifat

texts.en:
Marifat is a successful business woman. She is kind-hearted and good-natured.  For more than four years, she has owned a business selling women's clothing.  At first she sold children's clothes, but then she changed her business because this kind of business gives her more income. She has a growing business.  She knows all aspects of her dealings very well.
